English: may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
francais: longue vie heureuse et en parfaite harmonie

d.f: `祝~`人夫~`妻~`感情~`長久~`不變~。`通常~`作為~`結婚~`誌喜~`的~`賀詞~。

English: may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
francais: longue vie heureuse et en parfaite harmonie
